title: Venda Ravioli, Inc. Recalls Meat and Poultry Pasta Products Produced without Benefit of Inspection
summary: EDITORS NOTE:This release is being reissued as an expansion of the June 8, 2018 recall to include additional products. Details of this release were also updated to reflect a change in poundage. WASHINGTON, June 13, 2018 Venda Ravioli, Inc., a Providence, R.I. establishment, is recalling...
